attributes.title: Got a virus when I downloaded it ☹️
attributes.review:
Martha🌸 was 🥺an 😍average🥵 dog🐕
She 👁went👅- Woof!👺
And🧚🏻‍♂️- Woof!✨
And-🔥 Grrr!🌟
When 💦she 😳ate 👅some🧚🏻‍♂️ alphabet😍 soup👏🏻, then🌸 what💦 happened 👁was 🐕bizarre👁

[Scientist]
On ❤️the 😍way 👏to 👋Martha's 💗stomach, 🧚🏻‍♂️the ✨letters👺 lost🐕 their👅 way. 💦They 🔥traveled 🌟to 💜her 🥰brain 😭and 🤙now-🧚🏻‍♂️

[Narrator, Martha]
She's✨ got 🧚🏻‍♂️a 💖lot 👁to 💦say!👅
Now, 💖she ✨speaks🐕
How 🧚🏻‍♂️now, 👏brown 🥵cow👺
Martha😳 speaks🥺
Yeah,👅 she 🌸speaks 🌟and ✨speaks 💦and 🔥speaks🤙 and 💖speaks 🥵and ❤️speaks✨

[Narrator, Martha]
What's👏🏻 a ✨caboose?🧚🏻‍♂️ When 🥰are 💖we 💦eating 👅again?🥵

attributes.title: Absolute Garbage
attributes.review: This app is not only false news, but completely trash... it is bugged and has a lot of glitches and issues. Requested that the app is removed because it is a waste!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app is so terrible! It makes me feel uncomfortable, as I’m being shown a racist Cheeto looking pig thingy all over my screen 😔 I don’t want to see pigs all over my screen..!! Maybe fix that and get rid of that ugly burnt Cheeto too.

attributes.title: Yeah No
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to find a reason to vote for Mr. Trump, but as i was on the app it started to glitch. It started to shut my phone down, make weird noises and it also started freezing and glitching. I’m rating 1 star DO NOT RECOMMEND!

attributes.title: Worst app in History
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever made in history. It never saves any of my stuff and it’s lowering my battery life by 20% every minute it’s so stupid I wish you would be deleted

I got this app because they’re deleting tik tok and I THOUGHT it would be a fun replacement however comma this thing hacked my entire device so I had to go and get a WHOLE NEW PHONE 0/10 if i could put zero stars I WOULD 😒😒
